actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to extend child's insurance benefits to full-time students who have not attained the age of 26, and for other purposes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide for the payment of child's insurance benefits to full-time students under the age of 26 (currently such benefits are payable to full-time students under the age of 22).

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to extend child's insurance benefits to full-time students who have not attained the age of 26, and for other purposes.
